Test Steps: Navigated to the pages having product listings.

Test Case Description: Verify the search feature returns relevant results.
Expected Result: Only Audi displayed in the results.

Test Case Description: Verify adding cars to the wish list.
Test Steps:
1. Added a car to the wish list. 
2. Verified it appears in the wishlist.
Expected Result: The product appears in the wishlist.

Test Case Description: Verify product detail pages load correctly.
Test Steps:
1. Clicked on a car.  
2. Verified the detail page loads with relative information
Expected Result: Product detail page loads with correct details.

Test Case Description: Verify error message on API failure.
Verify page load time is under 2 seconds.

Test Steps: 2. Measure load time and performance score.

Test Case Description: Verify the site is responsive on different devices.
Test Steps: 1. Resize window layout (For different screen sizes)
Expected Result: The layout adjusts correctly on all.
Site works consistently on all browsers.
